name: logupts
description: LogUpTs is an extendable class, which logs your message with a generated prefix and postfix. The prefix and postfix strings have the possibility to add Placeholder that will be replaced when the script executes

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.es2015.json && tsc -p tsconfig.json && rollup -c && uglifyjs dist/browser/logupts.js -o dist/browser/logupts.min.js
scripts.externals: npm update strplace && cp node_modules/strplace/src/strplace.ts src/external/strplace.ts

author: Ren√© Schwarzinger
